attributes.additional_details:
Make it compulsory for a government in power to use all reasonable means to obtain all the tax owed to it by corporations and individuals and publish details of how this was achieved before contemplating any new taxes or raising existing taxes.
A priority should be made on those who should logically should being paying the most tax i.e large corporations.
This should also include active closing of any loopholes for tax dodging, no siphoning money off to offshore accounts or wives in other countries. "If its earned in the U.K. , Tax is paid in the U.K, no exceptions"
